name: Cube and the Super Beans
description: Go through 9 different worlds with a small little guy named "Cube" (He is shaped like a cube) Anyway, lets just say a lab experiment that went wrong has taken the Super Beans, a powerful set of beans that can do anything to the universe and there happened to be a cube living in that world. Now, that Cube finds this out, he goes on a mission to save the super beans.  With music made by Waterflame, it will be a bop! The best part is, its free! No purchase at all, and you can get early builds the farther along in development I get!
